seo: Confluence,漏洞检测,CVE-2019-3396,文件读取漏洞
summary: 该插件用于检测Confluence系统是否存在CVE-2019-3396文件读取漏洞，通过发送特定请求并验证响应内容来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Confluence system has the CVE-2019-3396 file read vulnerability. It confirms the existence of the vulnerability by sending specific requests and verifying the response content.
